values: A Radical Revelation of the Cross: The Sovereignty of God and the Sacrifice of JesusA Radical Revelation of the Cross: The Sovereignty of God and the Sacrifice of Jesus

When we embrace Christ’s cross and the unswerving foundation of God’s sovereignty, we will be kept by merciful and omnipotent glory.When we embrace Christ’s cross and the unswerving foundation of God’s sovereignty, we will be kept by merciful and omnipotent glory.
